Time Inc. Sports Illustrated Publishing and Business Records
Subseries IV.C. Promotion Development Manager Kathie-Lee Wilcox Files
Subseries IV.C. Promotion Development Manager Kathie-Lee Wilcox Files

Lee Wilcox's files document her work as the Women's Sports & Fitness (WSF) Promotion Director as part of Time Inc.'s trial run working on the magazine. The majority of the files focus on WSF although there are four folders either focused on other events or that aren't clearly related to WSF.
Records include correspondence, advertiser mailing lists, and press kits. Items of interest include letters to the editor in the General files.
